alert.note: Alert for Alcorn (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 13 at 12:30AM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central Alcorn, McNairy and west central Hardin Counties through 100 AM CDT... At 1230 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Selmer, moving southeast at 5 mph. HAZARD...Pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Corinth, Savannah, Selmer, Adamsville, Shiloh, McNairy, Crump, Bethel Springs, Eastview, Michie, Guys, Ramer, Stantonville, Forty Forks, Rose Creek, Good Hope, Pebble Hill, Wenasoga, Tulu and Old Lawton. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
